title: Science e-Learning Design and Application: Blended Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science theories and experimental methodology comprehension, with experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Blended learning incorporating digital devices, reflecting collaboration models between traditional universities and external technology providers. Students demonstrate learning outcomes through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and design effective delivery methods for science content on e-learning platforms.
Learners execute online discussion strategies to collaborate with peers and instructors in blended environments.
Learners demonstrate the ability to solve scientific problems using digital tools through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
